mapper.select: select a.staff_num staff_num,a.staff_name staff_name,a.staff_tel staff_tel , s.shop_name shop_sname,a.staff_position staff_position from staff a , shop s where s.shop_name like '%'||#{shop_name}||'%'
select a.staff_num staff_num,a.staff_name staff_name,a.staff_tel staff_tel , s.shop_name shop_sname,a.staff_position staff_position from staff a , shop s
select shop_sname from shop where staff_name=#{shop_name}and staff_tel=#{shop_stel}
select staff_pwd from staff where staff_name=#{staff_name} and staff_id=#{staff_id}
select staff_name,staff_tel,staff_num from staff where staff_shopnum=#{shop_num}
select count(*) work_login from workpay where WORK_FLAG=0 and WORK_STAFFNUM = #{staff_num}
select to_char( WORK_LOGIN ,'yy-MM-dd/hh24:mi') from workpay where WORK_flag=0 and WORK_STAFFNUM = #{work_staffnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE workpay SET work_flag=1 , work_logout=sysdate where work_staffnum=#{work_staffnum} and work_flag=0
mapper.select: select s.STAFF_NAME,WORK_LOGIN,work_logout,round ((WORK_LOGOUT-WORK_LOGIN)*24,2) work_time from workpay w,staff s where WORK_FLAG=1 and WORK_STAFFNUM=#{staff_num} and s.staff_shopnum=#{shop_num} and s.STAFF_NUM=w.WORK_STAFFNUM and( WORK_LOGIN >= to_date(#{date_ps},'yyyy-MM-dd') and WORK_LOGIN <= to_date(#{date_ps2},'yyyy-MM-dd')) order by 2
